definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
without rules, how can anything be done (idiom); one must follow some rules
pinyin: mei2 you3 gui1 ju5 , he2 yi3 cheng2 fang1 yuan2

sentences.english: How come, the branches irritated the jealous wind and messed up the pond?
sentences.chinese: 何以會有，那樹枝，掀起了妒火中燒的秋風？

sentences.english: Perhaps this is what call "A house is not, how can sweep the world".
sentences.chinese: 這就是所說的“一屋不掃，何以掃天下”吧。

sentences.english: "ketut, why is life all crazy like this?" I asked my medicine man the next day.
sentences.chinese: “賴爺，人生何以如此瘋狂？”隔天我問我的藥師。

sentences.chinese: 何以知家給，笙歌滿水濱。

sentences.english: Why did he always think of HIM when he was in discomfiture?

sentences.english: Opinions about Wedding ceremony at dusk has been widely explained since Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 自漢以來，親迎之禮何以“昏以爲期”衆說紛紜。

sentences.english: Why is Mr Obama abandoning one of his central election pledges?
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬何以棄競選時的重要承諾於不顧？

sentences.english: How did Christian belief provide a cultural matrix (womb) for the growth of science?
sentences.chinese: 基督教信仰何以爲科學的成長提供了一種文化母體？

sentences.english: Why the net my eyes, build lower source lotus.
sentences.chinese: 何以淨我眼，砌下生白蓮。

sentences.english: How could the regular annual accounting exercise have overlooked such a large chunk of China's output?
sentences.chinese: 常規的年度決算何以會忽略中國如此龐大的一塊產出？

sentences.english: Mom and dad, what makes your marriage last.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸媽媽，你們的婚姻何以能長久？

sentences.english: How to wash my ears, the house fly head spring.
sentences.chinese: 何以洗我耳，屋頭飛落泉。

sentences.english: Never smoking, no any bad habits, how can she got the lung cancer?
sentences.chinese: 不抽菸，沒有任何不良嗜好，何以得了肺癌？

sentences.english: Why the beds and lawns are leveled.
sentences.chinese: 牀榻與草地何以給弄得齊平。
阿姆斯特朗，你讓我情何以堪。

sentences.english: The part one mainly elucidates the reason why the culture of image has association with narrative novel.

definition: old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]

that being the case/then/in that case
